products.name: Piping Bag
products.description: A piping bag is a cone-shaped bag used for decorating cakes, cupcakes, and desserts. It is filled with icing or cream and squeezed to create different designs. The bag can be reusable or disposable.

products.name: 3 Set of Piping bag
products.description: A piping bag is a cone-shaped bag used for decorating cakes, cupcakes, and desserts. It is filled with icing or cream and squeezed to create different designs. The bag can be reusable or disposable.

products.name: Grass Decorating Nozzle
products.description: A nozzle is a small metal or plastic tip attached to the end of a piping bag. It controls the shape of the icing as it comes out. Nozzles come in different shapes and sizes to make patterns like stars, flowers, or writing.
